::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod was thinking about what to do. Should he give the order to
attack the Alliance base, ans save the captured bots, or stay, incase
the Preds attack.
Then he remembered how Prowl talked about getting the hostages back.
Thats what he was doing. Prowl can take care of that, we'll stay here.
If Hell Beast and Megatrons Preds show, all hell will break loose.
